}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Apparently used with some Mitsubishi TVs (see below for models).
*WD-60738 *WD-65738 *WD-73738 *WD-82738 *WD-65838 *WD-73838 *WD-82838 *LT-55154
The AW-NU231-D model is shown with a casing in the FCC docs while the AW-NU231 model is shown without.
{{See also|AzureWave AW-NU231-D|AzureWave}}
